content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position (16.0, 71.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (16.0, 71.0)

### Iron Ore Collection Point at position (15.5, 69.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (15.5, 69.5)

### Iron Smelting Facility at position (18.0, 70.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (18.0, 70.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are within a reasonable distance (max distance is 10) from the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with insufficient spacing
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to other entities to avoid collisions with existing entities.

### Errors when inserting items into entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
